item.title: Report X-2023082041
item.description:
Report X-2023082041

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-28
  • City: NEWBURGH
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: ITEM WAS PULLED FROM TRAILER AND PULLED AWAY FROM UNLOAD AND PLACED IN A BIN FOR HAZMATS DescribePack: QA WAS CALLED TO THE BELT TO CHECK ON PACKAGE UPON FURTHER INSPECTION QA SAW THAT THE CAP WAS LOOSE ON THE CAN INSIDE, ITEM DOESNT LEAK UNLESS TURNED UPSIDEDOWN WHICH IN TURN WAS DUE TO BAD HANDLING ITEMS WERE REPACKED IN A DRUM WAITING FOR DESPOSITION DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA WAS CALLED TO ASSESS PACKAGE AND CLEAN AREA

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

item.title: Report X-2023081588
item.description:
Report X-2023081588

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: RENSSELAER
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During the preload sort, it was raining and the bottom of the package had gotten damp. When the package handler had picked it up the glue holding the bottom of the box became loose and the box opened up at the bottom and the bottles came out and fell onto the floor. One of the bottles broke when it hit the floor. A manager placed absorb powder and pads on it to clean it up and placed the contents into a yellow hazmat drum. DescribePack: The bottom of the box became damp due to the rain and the glue became loose. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed into a yellow hazmat drum, sealed, and placed into the hazmat cage under ventilation.

item.title: Report X-2023081584
item.description:
Report X-2023081584

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-19
  • City: SYRACUSE
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was leaking on the loading dock at door 315. The item was put aside, and QA was called. At that time QA obtained the package with the proper PPE. No injuries were reported and or damages to other packages. DescribePack: The item was dented with a small crack causing it to leak inside its package DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: This item was placed the correct side up and concealed in a hazmat bag

item.title: Report X-2023081543
item.description:
Report X-2023081543

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-17
  • City: NEWBURGH
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I Was called to unload this morning to inspect a hazmat that came off a trailer leaking. upon inspecting 2 of the 4 caps on the bottles were missing and that was the cause of the leaking. DescribePack: loose caps DurationRel: 10 and MitigateEffect: I Put cleaning pads down on the floor to adsorb the liquid that was on the floor and truck.
